name: Three ZGhosts
description:
The game is about a guard who got into a dead forest many years ago. In the forest, three terrible monsters roamed.

 Many years have passed, but their bodies still walk through the forest and frighten to death everyone who wanders through the forest in ignorance. 

The essence of the game is to find a hut in which there is an old radio station that will help you get out of the forest.
